content.rendered:
This Medical Assistant position is full-time, Monday through Friday, 8:00 am till 5:00 pm. Medical Assistant Requirements:
  • 1-year experience of medical assisting
  • Casting experience
  • Current CPR license
  • EMR experience
Medical Assistant Duties:
  • Take and chart vitals
  • Document problem list
  • Call in prescriptions
  • Make appointments
  • Other duties
